WITH LIKE_COUNT AS (SELECT POST_NO, COUNT(*) CN FROM LIKES GROUP BY POST_NO ORDER BY CN DESC, POST_NO)
SELECT C.*, L.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKES L WHERE L.POST_NO = C.NO AND L.USER_ID = #{userId} AND L.BOARD_CODE = 'CT01') AS LIKE_CHK FROM CHALLENGES C JOIN (SELECT LIKE_RNK.* FROM (SELECT LIKE_COUNT.*, ROWNUM RWN FROM LIKE_COUNT) LIKE_RNK WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6 ORDER BY ROWNUM) L ON C.NO = L.POST_NO ORDER BY L.RWN

SELECT C.*, I.ATCH_PATH, (C.PARTICIR * C.DEDUCT_POINT) AS SUM_POINT, (C.CHAL_START_DATE - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) AS START_DAY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKES L WHERE L.POST_NO = C.NO AND L.USER_ID = #{userId} AND L.BOARD_CODE = 'CT01') AS LIKE_CHK, NVL((SELECT P.NO FROM CHALLENGE_PARTICIPATION P WHERE C.NO = P.NO AND P.USER_ID = #{userId}), 0) AS ATTEND_NO FROM CHALLENGES C RIGHT JOIN IMAGES I ON (C.NO = I.POST_NO) WHERE I.POST_NO = #{no} AND I.BOARD_CODE='CT01'
